articles.description: Jinny Howe — the Netflix exec who nurtured “Bridgerton” — discussed the cheeky, steamy period romance as well as several other dramas Netflix currently has in the works.
articles.content: With viewership from 82 million member households in its first 28 days online, Netflix is hailing Bridgerton as its biggest-ever debut for an original series on the streaming service, Variety has lea… [+5824 chars]
